title: Chat feedback
body:
This is the only feature that's causing me any real trouble and in honesty I have avoided using it as much as possible.

It is hard to manage conversations on the new system, especially as without clicking on the chat icon it does not automatically bring new conversations to the top.

If a single chat window is the system that is set in stone then perhaps set up an system that incorporates the friends list by pushing new messages to the top of the list on a fixed position style.
